Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Therapeutic Uses/Anti-Inflammatory Agents/Anti-Inflammatory Agents, Non-Steroidal/Cyclooxygenase Inhibitors

Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Physiological Effects of Drugs/Peripheral Nervous System Agents/Sensory System Agents/Analgesics/Analgesics, Non-Narcotic/Anti-Inflammatory Agents, Non-Steroidal/Cyclooxygenase Inhibitors
Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Molecular Mechanisms of Pharmacological Action/Enzyme Inhibitors/Cyclooxygenase Inhibitors
Record.Description: Compounds or agents that combine with cyclooxygenase (PROSTAGLANDIN-ENDOPEROXIDE SYNTHASES) and thereby prevent its substrate-enzyme combination with arachidonic acid and the formation of eicosanoids, prostaglandins, and thromboxanes.
